frontmatter.title: The Carbon team
frontmatter.description: Carbon is funded and built by IBM. That means we build for the company’s business needs. Carbon is also an open source community-driven project. It is available for anyone to use and everyone is encouraged to contribute.

internal.content:
---
title: The Carbon team
description:
  Carbon is funded and built by IBM. That means we build for the company’s
  business needs. Carbon is also an open source community-driven project. It is
  available for anyone to use and everyone is encouraged to contribute.
---

<PageDescription>

Carbon supports its users with a dedicated team of designers, developers, and
writers working closely to support teams across the business to be productive
and successful in designing digital experiences and products.

</PageDescription>

## The people

<Row>

<Profile name="Mike Abbink" title="IBM Distinguished Designer">

![Mike Abbink headshot](/images/team/abbink_mike.png)

</Profile>
<Profile name="John Bister" title="Motion Designer">

![John Bister headshot](/images/team/bister_john.png)

</Profile>
<Profile name="Josh Black" title="Software Developer, Technical Lead">

![Josh Black headshot](/images/team/black_josh.png)

</Profile>
<Profile name="Matt Brothers" title="Front-end Developer">

![Matt Brothers headshot](/images/team/brothers_matt.png)

</Profile>
<Profile name="Robin Cannon" title="Program Director">

![Robin Cannon headshot](/images/team/cannon_robin.png)

</Profile>
<Profile name="Andrea Cardona" title="Front-end Developer">

![Andrea Cardona headshot](/images/team/cardona_andrea.png)

</Profile>

![Jan Child headshot](/images/team/child_jan.png)

</Profile>

</Profile>

</Profile>

![Anna Gonzales headshot](/images/team/gonzales_anna.png)

</Profile>

![Ricardo Henriquez headshot](/images/team/henriquez_ricardo.png)

</Profile>

</Profile>

![Alison Joseph headshot](/images/team/joseph_alison.png)

</Profile>
<Profile name="D.A. Kahn" title="Front-end Developer, Accessibility Advocate">

![DA Kahn headshot](/images/team/kahn_da.png)

</Profile>
<Profile name="Josefina Mancilla"  title="Front-end Developer">

![Josefina Mancilla headshot](/images/team/mancilla_josefina.png)

</Profile>
<Profile name="Rafa Nogueras" title="Senior Software Developer">
